Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and summarize the week's accomplishments.
Conduct a final review of the week's tasks with all team members to ensure closings on open items.
Draft a weekly report detailing accomplishments and set goals for the following week.
Finalize and distribute the weekly report to @PEOPLE.
Refine team objectives based on feedback received during the week.
Have a casual wrap-up meeting with the team to celebrate the week's success and discuss any challenges.
Check emails for any last-minute updates, log off, and prepare for the weekend.
